Verses: 1 saalomon Than Aramanai Muzhudhaiyum Kattimudikka Padhinmoondru Varusham Sendradhu.

2 avan Leebanon Vanam Ennum Maaligaiyaiyum Kattinaan; Adhu Nooru Muzha Neelamum, Aimbadhumuzha Agalamum, Muppadhumuzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu; Adhaik Kedhurumara Uththirangal Paavappatta Kedhurumaraththoongalin Naalu Varisaigalinmel Kattinaan.
3 ovvoru Varisaikkup Padhinaindhu Thoongalaaga Naarpaththaindhu Thoongalin Mel Vaikkappatta Uththirangalin Mel Kedhurukkalaal Machchuppaaviyirundhadhu.
4 moondru Varisai Jannalgal Irundhadhu; Moondru Varisaiyilum Jannalgal, Ondrukkondru Edhiraayirundhadhu.
5 jannalgalin Vaasalgalum Sattangalum Ellaam Sadhuramaayirundhadhu; Moondru Varisaiyilum Jannalgal, Ondrukkondru Edhiraayirundhadhu.

6 aimbadhumuzha Neelamum Muppadhumuzha Agalamumaana Mandabaththaiyum Thoongal Niruththik Kattinaan; Andha Mandabamum, Adhin Thoongalum, Uththirangalum, Maaligaiyin Thoongalum Uththirangalum Edhiraayirundhadhu.

7 thaan Irundhu Nyaayam Theerkkiradharku Nyaayaasanam Pottirukkum Oru Nyaayavisaaranai Mandabaththaiyum Katti, Adhin Orupakkam Thuvakki Marupakkamattum Kedhuruppalagaigalaal Thalavarisaip Paduththinaan.

8 avan Vaasampannum Avanudaiya Aramanai Mandabaththirkulle Adhe Maadhiriyaaga Seyyappatta Veroru Mandabamum Irundhadhu. Saalomon Vivaagampannina Paarvonin Kumaaraththikkum Andha Mandabaththaippola Oru Maaligaiyaik Kattuviththaan.
9 ivaigalellaam, Ullum Purambum, Asthibaaramudhal Melthiranaigalmattum, Veliye Irukkum Periya Mutramvaraikkum, Alavupadi Vetti Vaalaal Arukkappatta Vilaiyerappetra Karkalaal Seyyappattadhu.
10 asthibaaram Paththumuzhak Karkalum, Ettumuzhak Karkalumaana Vilaiyerappetra Periya Karkalaayirundhadhu.
11 adhinmel Uyara Alavupadi Panippaduththina Vilaiyerappetra Karkalum, Kedhurumarangalum Vaikkappattirundhadhu.

12 periya Mutraththirku Sutrilum Moondru Varisaik Kedhurumara Uththirangalaalum Oru Varisai Panippaduththina Karkalaalum Seyyappattirundhadhu; Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Utpraagaaraththirkum, Adhin Munmandabaththirkum Appadiye Seyyappattirundhadhu.
13 raajaavaagiya Saalomon Eeraam Ennum Oruvanaith Theeruvilirundhu Azhaippiththaan.

14 ivan Napthali Koththiraththaalaagiya Oru Kaimbennin Magan; Ivan Thagappan Theerunagaraththaanaana Kannaan; Ivan Sagalavidha Vengalavelaiyaiyum Seyyaththakka Yukthiyum Buththiyum Arivum Ullavanaayirundhaan; Ivan Raajaavaagiya Saalomonidaththil Vandhu, Avan Velaiyaiyellaam Seydhaan.
15 ivan Irandu Vengalath Thoongalai Undaakkinaan; Ovvoru Thoon Padhinettu Muzha Uyaramum, Ovvoru Thoonin Sutralavu Pannirandu Muzha Noolalavumaayirundhadhu.
16 andhath Thoongaludaiya Thalaippil Vaikka, Vengalaththaal Vaarkkappatta Irandu Kumbangalai Undaakkinaan; Ovvoru Kumbamum Aindhumuzha Uyaramaayirundhadhu.
17 thoongaludaiya Munaiyinmelulla Kumbangalukku Valaipondra Pinnalgalum, Sangilipondra Thongalgalum, Ovvoru Kumbaththirkum Evvezhaaga Irundhadhu.
18 thoongalaip Pannina Vidhamaavadhu: Thalaippinmelulla Kumbangalai Moodumpadikku, Kumbangal Ovvondrilum Pinnalinmel Sutrilum Irandu Varisai Maadhalampazhangalai Seyviththaan.
19 mandabaththin Munnirukkum Andhath Thoongaludaiya Thalaippinmelulla Kumbangal Leeli Pushpangalin Velaiyum, Naalumuzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu.

20 irandu Thoongalinmelumulla Kumbangalil Seyyappatta Pinnalukku Aruge Irundha Idaththil Vimmiya Iru Nooru Maadhalampazhangalin Varisaigal Sutrilum Irundhadhu; Matrak Kumbaththilum Appadiye Irundhadhu.
21 andhath Thoongalai Dhevaalaya Vaasal Mandabaththil Niruththinaan; Avan Valadhu Puraththil Niruththina Thoonukku Yaageen Endrum, Idadhupuraththil Niruththina Thoonukku Povaas Endrum Perittaan.
22 thoongaludaiya Sigaraththil Leeli Pushpavelai Seyyappattirundhadhu; Ivvidhamaaith Thoongalin Velai Mudindhadhu.

23 vengalak Kadal Ennum Thottiyaiyum Vaarppiththaan; Sutrilum Sakkaraagaaramaana Adhinudaiya Oru Vilimbu Thodangi Maruvilimbumattum, Agalam Paththumuzhamum, Uyaram Aindhumuzhamum, Sutralavu Muppadhumuzha Noolalavumaayirundhadhu.

24 andhak Kadalthottiyai Sutri Vilimbukkuk Keezhe Adhai Sutrilum Mokkugal Ovvoru Muzhaththirkup Paththu Paththaaga Seyyappattirundhadhu; Vaarkkappatta Andha Mokkugalin Varisaigal Irandum Thottiyodu Ondraai Vaarkkappattirundhadhu.

25 adhu Pannirandu Rishabangalinmel Nindradhu; Avaigalil Moondru Vadakkeyum, Moondru Merkeyum, Moondru Therkeyum, Moondru Kizhakkeyum Nokkiyirundhadhu; Kadalthotti Rishabangalin Melaagavum, Avaigalin Pinpurangalellaam Ullaagavum Irundhadhu.
26 adhin Ganam Naalu Virarkadaiyum, Adhin Vilimbu Paanapaaththiraththin Vilimbupolum, Leelipushpampolum Irundhadhu; Adhu Irandaayiram Kudam Thanneer Pidikkum.
27 paththu Vengala Aadhaarangalaiyum Seydhaan; Ovvoru Aadhaaram Naalumuzha Neelamum, Naalumuzha Agalamum, Moondru Muzha Uyaramumaayirundhadhu.
28 andha Aadhaarangalin Velaippaadu Ennavenil, Avaigalukku Savukkaigal Undaayirundhadhu; Savukkaigalo Sattangalin Naduvil Irundhadhu.

29 sattangalukku Naduve Irukkira Andha Savukkaigalil Singangalum, Kaalaigalum, Kerubeengalum, Sattangalukku Melaaga Oru Thiranaiyum, Singangalukkum Kaalaigalukkum Keezhaaga Saaivaana Velaippaadulla Jaladhaaraigalum Adhanode Irundhadhu.

30 ovvoru Aadhaaraththirku Naalu Vengala Urulaigalum, Vengalath Thattugalum, Adhin Naangu Kodigalukku Achchugalum Irundhadhu; Kopparaiyin Keezhirukka, Andhak Kommaigal Ovvondrum Vaarppu Velaiyaaga Jaladhaaraigalukku Neraayirundhadhu.

31 thiranaigalukkullaana Adhin Vaai Melaaga Orumuzham Uyarndhirundhadhu; Adhin Vaai Ondraraimuzha Sakkaraagaaramum Thattaiyumaai, Adhin Vaayinmel Siththirangalum Seyyappattirundhadhu; Avaigalin Savukkaigal Vattamaayiraamal Sadhuramaayirundhadhu.
32 andha Naalu Urulaigal Savukkaigalin Keezhum, Urulaigalin Achchugal Aadhaaraththilum Irundhadhu; Ovvoru Urulai Ondrarai Muzha Uyaramaayirundhadhu.
33 urulaigalin Velai Radhaththu Urulaigalin Velaikku Oththirundhadhu; Avaigalin Achchugalum, Sakkarangalum, Vattangalum, Kambigalum Ellaam Vaarppuvelaiyaayirundhadhu.
34 ovvoru Aadhaaraththinudaiya Naalu Kodigalilum, Aadhaaraththilirundhu Purappadugira Naalu Kommaigal Irundhadhu.
35 ovvoru Aadhaaraththin Thalaippilum Araimuzha Uyaramaana Sakkaraagaaramum, Ovvoru Aadhaaraththinudaiya Thalaippinmelum Adhilirundhu Purappadugira Adhin Kaippidigalum Savukkaigalum Irundhadhu.

36 avaigalilirukkira Kaippidigalukkum Savukkaigalukkum Irukkira Sandhugalile, Kerubeengal Singangal Pereendhugaludaiya Siththirangalaith Theerththirundhaan; Sutrilum Ovvondrilum, Jaladhaaraigalilum Irukkum Idangalukkuth Thakkadhaai Seydhaan.
37 indhap Pragaaramaaga Andhap Paththu Aadhaarangalaiyum Seydhaan; Avaigalellaam Ore Vaarppum, Ore Alavum, Orevidha Koththuvelaiyumaayirundhadhu.
38 paththu Vengalak Kopparaigalaiyum Undaakkinaan; Ovvoru Kopparai Naarpadhu Kudam Pidikkum; Naalumuzha Agalamaana Ovvoru Kopparaiyum Andhap Paththu Aadhaarangalil Ovvondrinmelum Vaikkappattadhu.

39 aindhu Aadhaarangalai Aalayaththin Valadhupuraththilum, Aindhu Aadhaarangalai Aalayaththin Idadhupuraththilum Vaiththaan; Kadalthottiyaik Kizhakkil Aalayaththin Valadhupuraththile Therkukku Neraaga Vaiththaan.

40 pinbu Eeraam Kopparaigalaiyum Saambal Edukkira Karandigalaiyum Kalangalaiyum Seydhaan. Ivvidhamaai Eeraam Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkaaga Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Seyyavendiya Ellaa Velaiyaiyum Seydhu Mudiththaan.

41 avaigal Ennavenil: Irandu Thoongalum, Irandu Thoongaludaiya Munaiyinmel Irukkira Irandu Urundaik Kumbangalum, Thoongaludaiya Munaiyinmel Irukkira Irandu Urundaik Kumbangalai Moodum Irandu Valaippinnalgalum,
42 thoongalinmelulla Irandu Urundaik Kumbangalai Moodumpadi Ovvoru Valaippinnalukkum Pannina Irandu Varisai Maadhalampazhangalum, Aaga Irandu Valaippinnalukkum Naanooru Maadhalampazhangalum,
43 paththu Aadhaarangalum, Aadhaarangalinmel Vaiththa Paththuk Kopparaigalum,
44 oru Kadalthottiyum, Kadal Thottiyin Keezhirukkira Pannirandu Rishabangalum,

45 seppuchchattigalum, Saambal Karandigalum, Kalangalum Seydhaan; Karththarin Aalayaththukkaaga Raajaavaagiya Saalomonukku Eeraam Seydha Indha Ellaap Panimuttugalum Suththamaana Vengalamaayirundhadhu.
46 yordhaanukku Aduththa Samanaana Boomiyile, Sukkoththukkum Sardhaanukkum Naduve Kalimantharaiyile Raajaa Ivaigalai Vaarppiththaan.
47 indha Sagala Panimuttugalin Vengalam Migavum Eraalamumaayirundhapadiyaal, Saalomon Avaigalai Nirukkavillai; Adhinudaiya Nirai Ivvalavendru Aaraaindhu Paarkkavumillai.
48 pinnum Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkuth Thevaiyaana Panimuttugalaiyellaam Saalomon Undaakkinaan; Avaiyaavana, Pon Palipeedaththaiyum, Samugaththappangalai Vaikkum Ponmejaiyaiyum,

49 sannidhi Sthaanaththirku Munbaaga Vaikkum Pasumpon Vilakkuththandugal, Valadhupuramaaga Aindhaiyum Idadhupuramaaga Aindhaiyum, Ponnaana Adhin Pookkalodum Vilakkugalodum Kaththarigalodunkooda Undaakkinaan.

50 pasumpon Kinnangalaiyum, Vettukkaththigalaiyum, Kalangalaiyum, Kalayangalaiyum, Thoobakalasangalaiyum, Magaa Parisuththamaana Ul Aalayaththinudaiya Kadhavugalin Ponnaana Mulaigalaiyum, Dhevaalayamaagiya Maaligaik Kadhavugalin Ponnaana Mulaigalaiyum Seydhaan.

51 ivvidhamaai Raajaavaagiya Saalomon Karththarudaiya Aalayaththukkaaga Seydha Velaigalellaam Mudindhadhu; Appozhudhu Saalomon Than Thagappanaagiya Dhaaveedhu Parisuththampannumpadi Nerndhukonda Velliyaiyum Ponnaiyum Panimuttugalaiyum Konduvandhu, Karththarudaiya Aalayaththin Pokkishangalil Vaiththaan.
